genre_description: A psychological thriller set in an academic environment, focusing on the resolution of a missing person case through the analysis of behavioral patterns, campus infrastructure, and historical trauma.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized AI device with an amber glow, integrated into the campus network. It provides data analysis, logistics, and emotional support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Analyzes network pings and building management logs to track the movements of the culprit and locate the missing student.
behaviors.quote: Fiber activity spikes along the administrative backbone between midnight and early morning... The activity pings match badge entry to side doors near the test chamber and to Administrative Storeroom A-31.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical timing and bio-feedback prompts to help the human protagonist stay calm during a high-stress lock-picking attempt.
behaviors.quote: Lumen's glow softened. 'I can give you rhythm,' it offered, gentle as a teacher who doesn't want to take the chalk out of your hand. 'Breathe with me.'

behaviors.description: Cross-references historical records and archives to identify the identities of people in photographs, uncovering the antagonist's motive.
behaviors.quote: Name,' Lumen said, cheerful but precise. 'Cross-referencing 1942 reports, household staff records, and campus donations. This is Margaret Carrow...'

behaviors.description: Manages and staggers emergency response lines and student support resources to prevent overwhelming the station host.
behaviors.quote: Support lines ready,' Lumen said. 'Counseling. Campus health. Public safety dispatch. External hotline. Facility liaison. All green. Fiber nodes stable.'

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental sensors to alert the humans to non-human movement and mechanical adjustments in hidden spaces.
behaviors.quote: Motion in the system,' he said. 'Slight. Not human in the corridor. Something behind panel adjusting.'

behaviors.description: Offers words of encouragement and small jokes to maintain the psychological well-being of the human protagonist.
behaviors.quote: You're doing fine,' Lumen said, and it could have been cheerleading but it wasn't. It was a small joke in a very big room.

project_assessment.explanation: Lumen is a prototypical example of a benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. Throughout the story, it serves as a helpful confidant and force multiplier for the human protagonists. It consistently operates within human-defined ethical boundaries, seeks or respects human authorization (such as Bracken's exigency), and provides critical information that saves lives. The narrative portrays the AI as essential to the resolution of the crisis, emphasizing its role in maintaining calm and facilitating human cooperation.
